scripts.text:
use schema azurestage;
create or replace TABLE CUSTOMER_TRANSACTIONS_FRAUD (
	TRANSACTION_ID NUMBER(38,0),
	TX_DATETIME TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9),
	CUSTOMER_ID NUMBER(38,0),
	TERMINAL_ID NUMBER(38,0),
	TX_AMOUNT FLOAT,
	TX_TIME_SECONDS NUMBER(38,0),
	TX_TIME_DAYS NUMBER(38,0),
	TX_FRAUD NUMBER(38,0),
	TX_FRAUD_SCENARIO NUMBER(38,0)
);

copy into CUSTOMER_TRANSACTIONS_FRAUD
  from @my_azure_stage/fraud_transactions.csv
  file_format = (format_name = 'my_csv_format' , error_on_column_count_mismatch=false)
  on_error = 'skip_file';
